Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Grace.
ShortDescription: Revised: 85 Central buses temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison & Central, due to street blockage near Central/Grace

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison then resume their normal route at Central, due to street blockage near Central/Grace.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running with delays due to inclement weather.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with major delays due to inclement weather.

 Shuttle buses are available between Garfield and 63rd Ashland to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 63rd Ashland and Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and 63rd/Ashland due to inclement weather.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and 63rd/Ashland due to inclement weather.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem and Cottage Grove at this time.

Shuttle buses are have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.  Shuttle buses have been requested between Garfield and 63rd/Ashland to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Oakley
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley

Allow extra travel time.
